thread.title: Council closes flat of antisocial tenant (Croydon London Borough Council)

title: Council closes flat of antisocial tenant (Croydon London Borough Council)
text: ( Source : Croydon London Borough Council ) Residents who had to endure months of drug-related activity, antisocial behaviour and vandalism have seen the flat at the centre of the disturbances closed for three months. On Wednesday (14), the
